Description_ES: Response ID
Description_EN: Response ID

Description_ES: ANIO - ¿En qué año nació?
Description_EN: In what year were you born?

Description_ES: EDAD-Tramo edad
Description_EN: Age category

Description_ES: PAIS - ¿En qué país nació?
Description_EN: In which country were you born?

Description_ES: DEPARTAMENTO - ¿En qué departamento/provincia vive Usted?
Description_EN: In which province do you live?

Description_ES: REGION-¿Y a qué región corresponde el departamento/provincia en la que vive?
Description_EN: What region corresponds to the province you live in?

Description_ES: CIUDAD - ¿En qué ciudad vive Usted?
Description_EN: What city do you live in?

Description_ES: GENERO - ¿Cuál es su género?
Description_EN: What is your gender?

Description_ES: ESTADOCIVIL - ¿Cuál es su estado civil?
Description_EN: What is your marital status?

Description_ES: HOGAR - ¿Cuántas personas viven en su hogar incluyéndose a usted mismo/a?
Description_EN: How many people live in your household including yourself?

Description_ES: HIJOS - ¿Usted tiene hijos?
Description_EN: Do you have children?

Description_ES: EDUCACION - ¿Cuál es el nivel de educación más alto que usted alcanzó?
Description_EN: What is the highest level of education you have achieved?

Description_ES: ACTIVIDAD - ¿Cuál es su actividad actual?
Description_EN: What is your current employment activity?

Description_ES: Q10 - Imagínese una escala de 5 peldaños, en el que en el “1” se ubican las personas más pobres y en el "5" se ubican las personas más ricas, ¿dónde se ubicaría usted?
Description_EN: Imagine a scale of 5 steps, in which the poorest people are in “1” and on the "5" step are the richer people, where would you rank yourself?

Description_ES: Q11 - Durante los últimos 30 días, ¿hubo un momento en el que su hogar se quedó sin alimentos por falta de dinero u otros recursos?
Description_EN: During the past 30 days, was there a time when your household ran out of food due to lack of money or other resources?

Description_ES: Q12 - ¿Recibe algún subsidio monetario, programa social o transferencia de dinero por parte del gobierno?
Description_EN: Do you receive any monetary subsidy, social program or money transfer from the government?

Description_ES: Q13 - En la política se habla normalmente  de “izquierda” y “derecha”. En una escala donde "0" es la "izquierda" y "10" la "derecha", ¿dónde se ubicaría usted?
Description_EN: In politics we usually speak of "left" and "right". On a scale where "0" is the "left and 10 the "right ", where would you place yourself?

Description_ES: Q14 - ¿Cuál es el ingreso total mensual de su hogar (sumando el de todos los miembros de su hogar) en un mes típico reciente en pesos dominicanos?
Description_EN: What is the total monthly income of your household (adding that of all the members of your household) in a recent typical month in Dominican pesos?

Description_ES: Q15 - ¿Tendría como vecinos a Personas lesbianas, gays, bisexuales o trans?
Description_EN: Would you have as neighbors: Lesbian, gay, bisexual or trans people?

Description_ES: Q15 - ¿Tendría como vecinos a Personas migrantes?
Description_EN: Would you have as neighbors: Migrant people?

Description_ES: Q15 - ¿Tendría como vecinos a Personas de una raza o etnia diferente a la suya?
Description_EN: Would you have as neighbors: People of a different race or ethnicity than yours?

Description_ES: Q15 - ¿Tendría como vecinos a Personas de una religión diferente a la suya?
Description_EN: Would you have as neighbors: People of a different religion than yours?

Description_ES: Q16 - A veces es difícil ver las cosas desde el punto de vista de otros
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  Sometimes it is difficult to see things from the point of view of others.

Description_ES: Q16 - A menudo tengo sentimientos de preocupación por las personas con menos oportunidades que yo
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  I often have feelings of concern for people with fewer opportunities than me.

Description_ES: Q16 - En REPÚBLICA DOMINICANA, todo el mundo tiene la oportunidad de triunfar y tener éxito económico
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  In the Dominican Republic, everyone has the opportunity to succeed and be economically successful

Description_ES: Q17 - ¿Qué influye más en que una persona sea pobre?
Description_EN: What has the most influence on whether a person is poor?

Description_ES: Q18 - De cada 100 habitantes de REPÚBLICA DOMINICANA,¿cuántos cree usted que son migrantes?
Description_EN: Out of every 100 inhabitants in the Dominican Republic, how many do you think are migrants?

Description_ES: Q19 - En REPÚBLICA DOMINICANA, de cada 100 personas 29,2 terminaron la educación secundaria, ¿cuántos de cada 100 migrantes cree usted que terminaron la educación secundaria?
Description_EN: In the Dominican Republic, 29.2 out of 100 people finish secondary education. Out of 100 migrants in the Dominican Republic, how many you think have completed secondary education?

Description_ES: Q32 - A veces es difícil ver las cosas desde el punto de vista de los migrantes
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  Sometimes it is difficult to see things from migrants’ point of view

Description_ES: Q20 - Si usted tuviera algún dinero adicional: ¿a cuál de las siguientes organizaciones de su país donaría o no donaría a nadie?
Description_EN: If you had any additional money: to which of the following organizations in your country, would you donate, or would not donate to anyone?

Description_ES: Q22 - Que migrantes vivan en su país
Description_EN: Please read the following sentence and select whether you think that the circumstances they describe are good, bad or that it depends: That migrants live in your country.

Description_ES: Q22 - Que un migrante sea su vecino/a
Description_EN: Please read the following sentence and select whether you think that the circumstances they describe are good, bad or that it depends: That a migrant is your neighbor.

Description_ES: Q22 - Que un migrante se case con un(a) familiar cercano(a) suyo(a)
Description_EN: Please read the following sentence and select whether you think that the circumstances they describe are good, bad or that it depends: That a migrant marries a close relative of yours.

Description_ES: Q23 - Se puede confiar en los migrantes que viven en REPÚBLICA DOMINICANA tanto como en los dominicanos
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  We can trust migrants living in the Dominican Republic as much as Dominicans.

Description_ES: Q23 - Los migrantes contribuyen a la economía del país
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Migrants contribute to the country's economy.

Description_ES: Q23 - Los migrantes vienen a competir por nuestros trabajos
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Migrants come to compete for our jobs.

Description_ES: Q23 - Los migrantes aumentan el crimen
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Migrants increase crime.

Description_ES: Q23 - La mayoría de las mujeres migrantes acaban ejerciendo la prostitución
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Most migrant women end up practicing prostitution.

Description_ES: Q23 - Los migrantes mejoran nuestra sociedad al traer nuevas ideas y culturas
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Migrants improve our society by bringing new ideas and cultures.

Description_ES: Q23 - Los migrantes son una carga para el Estado
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: Migrants are a burden on the State.

Description_ES: Q23 - En general, los migrantes contribuyen al país más de lo que toman de él
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following:  In general, migrants contribute more to the country than what they take from it.

Description_ES: Q24 - Ayuda humanitaria como alojamiento temporal, alimentación y atención de urgencias médicas
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: the government of the Dominican Republic providing migrants living with access to humanitarian aid such as temporary accommodation, food and medical emergency care.

Description_ES: Q24 - Permiso de trabajo o documento que les permita trabajar legalmente
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: the government of the Dominican Republic providing migrants with access to work permit or documents that allows them to work legally.

Description_ES: Q24 - Prestación de servicios de salud en las mismas condiciones que a los dominicanos
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: the government of the Dominican Republic providing migrants with health services in the same conditions that these are provided to Dominicans.

Description_ES: Q24 - Prestación de servicios de educación para los niños y jóvenes en las mismas condiciones que a los dominicanos
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: the government of the Dominican Republic providing education services for migrant children and young people in the same conditions as they are provided to Dominicans.

Description_ES: Q24 - Prestación de servicios de salud para los niños migrantes en las mismas condiciones que a los dominicanos
Description_EN: How much do you agree or disagree with the following: the government of the Dominican Republic providing health services for migrant children in the same conditions as they are provided to Dominicans.

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mis amigos
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my friends

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mis conocidos (compañeros de escuela/trabajo/etc.)
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my acquaintances (classmates / work / etc.)

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mis empleados o prestadores de servicios para mi
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my employees or service providers for me

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mis empleadores
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my employers

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mi pareja
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my partner

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, como mis vecinos
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, as my neighbors

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, otro
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Yes, other

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Ninguna relación
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - No relationship

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Prefiere no contestar
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Prefer not to answer

Description_ES: Q25-¿Está usted en contacto con migrantes en su vida cotidiana? - Si, otro [ESPECIFIQUE]
Description_EN: Are you in contact with migrants in your daily life? - Please specify other

Description_ES: Grupo de tratamiento al que fue asignado
Description_EN: Assigned treatment group
